list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "llite_stats_max" WITH KEY = fs_name
list.label: Filesystem Name
list.name: fs_name
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "llite_stats_max" WITH KEY = fs_name

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "llite_stats_max" WITH KEY = client_uuid WHERE "fs_name" = '$fs_name'
list.label: Client UUID
list.name: client_uuid
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "llite_stats_max" WITH KEY = client_uuid WHERE "fs_name" = '$fs_name'
